metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14652 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Gluster file system through versions 3.12 and 4.1.4 is vulnerable to abuffer overflow in the 'features/index' translator via the code handlingthe 'GF_XATTR_CLRLK_CMD' xattr in the 'pl_getxattr' function. A remoteauthenticated attacker could exploit this on a mounted volume to cause adenial of service.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
